channel.title: Clothing?
channel.description:
I was just wondering why pretty much all highstreet man clothing has brands all over it, and yet hardly any womens clothing has brands/writing on?
Not really expecting a direct answer, it was more a topic for you to ponder.

item.title: Clothing?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:105, topic:331586”][quote author=Acelim link=topic=427966.msg3278217#msg3278217 date=1279698374]
I recently bought my clothes in our local Walmart. I don’t depend on the brand but it is on the design. I don’t prepared a much expensive clothing.
[/quote]
Whats with you and Walmart[/quote]

Obviously he searched for ‘walmart’ with the forum search and replied to every topic that came up.

Read full topic

item.title: Clothing?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Wtf guys, cheap doesn’t necessarily mean good. Don’t you have any sense of style? Why buy 10 shirts for $30 when you can get one shirt for the same price and look good?

not every1 can afford expensive clothing man and some people just dont like how they look but i think same way i would just get the nicer 1 lol

Read full topic

item.title: Clothing?
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

I would like to say that I love Kane more then i used to as a result of this thread.
Mopman is an idiot everyone assumes that when we say thongs we mean g-strings. My friend went overseas and lost her “thong” at the beach and 2 elderly ladies overheard and called her a slut

I preffer to make my own clothes then buy them its heaps cheaper and you get exactally what you want.
Although i do buy jeans and what not. which usually cost around $70-300

Read full topic

item.title: Clothing?
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:1, topic:331586”]I was just wondering why pretty much all highstreet man clothing has brands all over it, and yet hardly any womens clothing has brands/writing on?

Not really expecting a direct answer, it was more a topic for you to ponder.[/quote]
accually the “sluttier” brand of women clothing have brands or writing on it. and then the women expect guys to wear similar clothing, so we do =P
but it really just matters where you live.

Read full topic

item.title: Clothing?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:82, topic:331586”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=427966.msg3150275#msg3150275 date=1268482586]
You seem to be assigning the word ‘ragged’ to clothing that is ‘cheap’. I don’t think this is fair.
Cheap clothing isn’t necessarily poor quality clothing. I’m not talking about walking down the street with a beard, no deoderant, and unwashed for days on end.

At the end of the day, what is the real difference between an $80 cotton T-shirt and a $10 cotton T-shirt? Logos and any other markings that might demonstrate a level of affluence aside.
[/quote]
You got me wrong man. I meant all of the overpriced clothes that are apparently fashionable when they’re all ripped up etc. Those are the rags.

And beards can be good. They’re manly.[/quote]
Wasn’t painting beards in a bad light. Just presenting the image of a typical ungroomed person.

Read full topic

item.title: Clothing?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:81, topic:331586”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=427966.msg3150296#msg3150296 date=1268485452]

At the end of the day, what is the real difference between an $80 cotton T-shirt and a $10 cotton T-shirt? Logos and any other markings that might demonstrate a level of affluence aside.

the $80 shirt would have a much better fit and would be made to a higher standard
[/quote]What are you on about? Stop posting when you clearly know nothing about the manufacturing of products or dynamics of business.[/quote]
from what i’ve seen, neither do you, so if you want to contribute to the discussion why not share some of your knowledge of clothing products and the dynamics of business?

i simply meant that when you see people in clothes as simple as an expensive tshirt, they look much better on them than the cheap ones because they are better designed and are not baggy in places etc

and yes lothy, thats pretty much what i meant.

Read full topic
